name: Personalised Reading Schemes
description:
Personalised Reading Scheme for beginners
(click on picture to enhance image)
Stage 1 includes  6 books,
Set of stickers to show completion of each book, clear zip pocket for easy storage.

Every child needs encouragement when they are beginning to read on their own.  This personalised reading scheme helps encourage and motivate children as the stories are about them.  
They use clear font, repetition of words and gradual introduction of new words.  Stage 1 introduces new words taken from the Children's Oxford Dictionary.

When ordering please write down : Name of child / boy or girl / hair colour, in the (note to seller) section which is underneath your postal address, this way I can personalise your order.  

Thanks
